Html:
Is it possible to work with multiple files?
If we have two cached/exported files like palmsprings,gmdb and lasvegas.gmdb, can we create a dropdown and tell the program to use selected file??
Thanks in advance
Steve
you don't need to do anything, it's automatic, if these files are in cache folder, it's done
Thank you, so all the files in cache folder with gmdb extension will be used to display map! The data doesn't have to be in Data.gmdb which is the default cache file!!
